snippet: In addition to running JPMorgan’s commodities business, Blythe Masters competes in horse shows occasionally and has enjoyed success recently in her equestrian pursuits.
abstract: In addition to running JPMorgan’s commodities business, Blythe Masters competes in horse shows occasionally and has enjoyed success recently in her equestrian pursuits.

headline.main: JPMorgan Executive May Trade Corporate Saddle for a Real One
